Message from the CEO

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.5.7″ width=”70%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”76px||76px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We stand behind our brand, our credibility, our products. Using just top-notch strategies and processes, we are trying to establish a foothold in the Mineral industries. Bringing together an incredible network of employees, staff, suppliers and distributors, we will meet just about every requirement that the company or industry may have when it comes to what we sell.

As we focus primarily on polishing our competitive advantage, we will continue to seek value-added capabilities for our customers. Refusing to settle for something other than the very finest of quality and assurances, we are continuously looking for change and improved results.

Going forward, we will expand our overseas bases to facilitate more globalisation and grow human capital here and abroad as part of our quest to build new business projects and reinforce our current business framework.
In an era of rapid change and ever-diversifying common values, we must proactively engage to keep up with these changes, maintain a resolute approach to corporate social responsibility, and continue to develop the confidence of all stakeholders and society at large.

We at GMCI PRIVATE LIMITED look forward to your continuous trust and support in the coming years. This is my message to you and my pledge to the refractory Mineral industries worldwide.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/ceo-sign.jpg” title_text=”ceo sign” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”35%” module_alignment=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
